audioText: Elle saura parler français couramment après six mois d'études.
question: When will she be able to speak French fluently?
explanation: The sentence says 'Elle saura parler français couramment après six mois d'études' - She will know how to speak French fluently after six months of studies. 'Saura' is the future tense of 'savoir' (to know/be able to).
